explanation: [0-0] Outdoors, a little boy in a dark blue T-shirt and grey pants is riding a brown toy horse, behind him is a little boy in a blue T-shirt and light blue pants riding a white toy horse, their hands gripping silver metal bars, the toy horses moving along a yellow track.
